Marco Island Brewery  | Marco Island Vacation Properties Skip to main content (239) 393-2121 Menu Vacation Rentals All Rentals Weekly Monthly Search By Amenity Search by Area Specials Houses Condos Search by Name Area Guide About Marco Activities Beaches Blog Restaurants Guest Services Our Services eCheck Payment Travel Insurance Book Direct Owners Prospective Owners Owner Login About Us Contact Us Real Estate You are here Home Marco Island Brewery Marco Island Brewery is a casual sports bar and local hangout with a wide selection of craft beers, hearty pub food, and plenty of TVs for catching the game. With both indoor seating and a shaded outdoor patio, it’s the perfect spot for lunch, dinner, or drinks. The menu includes everything from wings and burgers to flatbreads and seafood! Staff 2025-01-14T13:38:41-05:00 EC: Reserve Mcleod Park? Can I reserve the Mcleod Park for an event? To Reserve the City Park for an Event contact the City Clerk at (239) 695-4558 or email: Dsmallwood@cityofeverglades.org ( CityofEverglades.org ) Park: Drones in the Park? Staff 2023-12-09T10:15:54-05:00 Park: Drones in the Park? Can I fly my drone in Everglades National Park? No, drones and other unmanned aircraft are not allowed in the park, or any other National Park Service site. This includes model airplanes, quadcopters, etc. ( nps.gov ) Park: Which Park to Hunt Staff 2023-12-09T10:13:13-05:00 Park: Which Park to Hunt Where can I hunt in Everglades National Forrest? Hunting is permitted exclusively in Big Cypress Preserve. Visit our hunting page for more details. POI: Long Term Parking Staff 2023-12-09T10:07:15-05:00 POI: Long Term Parking Where can I park my car if I’m leaving in a boat for an extended trip? Check with The Ship Store at (239) 642-3133 or Port of the Islands Marina at (239) 389-0367. POI: Trip Time to the Ocean Staff 2023-12-09T10:07:22-05:00 POI: Trip Time to the Ocean How long does it take to get out to the ocean from Port of the Islands It usually takes around 45 minutes to cruise from the Port of the Islands to the ocean. The journey includes navigating through a long, no-wake zone canal, providing a delightful and unhurried ride. Bring a cover for sun protection during this slow and scenic route. About half an hour in, you’ll arrive at the expansive and naturally beautiful mangroves before reaching the open waters of the ocean. POI: Where can I park? Staff 2023-12-09T09:52:59-05:00 POI: Where can I park? In Port of the Islands, where can I park if I’m going out on the water? You can park in the parking lot by Port of the Islands Marina. Check with The Ship Store at (239) 642-3133 or Port of the Islands Marina at (239) 389-0367. Go to Top
